Key Match Events: Jackson Irvine scored the first goal for Australia in the 50th minute after a failed grab by Indian goalkeeper Gurpreet Singh Sandhu.
Jordan Bos scored the second goal for Australia in the 74th minute after a combination play with Riley McGree.
Post-Match Reflections: Indian coach Igor Stimac kept a close watch on his team, showing their commitment and determination.
The large number of Indian fans present felt proud and encouraged by the Blue Tigers' performance despite the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Ahmad bin Ali Stadium in Doha, Qatar.
India will play their next match in Group B against Uzbekistan on January 18 at the same stadium.
